ThingDef.label: amethyst
ThingDef.description: A violet variety of quartz.

ThingDef.label: amber
ThingDef.description: A hard translucent fossilized resin.

ThingDef.label: angelite
ThingDef.description: A glacier-blue form of anhydrite.

ThingDef.label: aquamarine
ThingDef.description: A blue variety of beryl.

ThingDef.label: benitoite
ThingDef.description: A rare blue barium titanium silicate mineral.

ThingDef.label: bixbite
ThingDef.description: A red variety of beryl.

ThingDef.label: chrysoprase
ThingDef.description: A light blue-green variety of chalcedony.

ThingDef.label: dioptase
ThingDef.description: An intense emerald-green to bluish-green copper cyclosilicate mineral.

ThingDef.label: ekanite
ThingDef.description: An dull green uncommon silicate mineral.

ThingDef.label: emerald
ThingDef.description: A green variety of beryl.

ThingDef.label: garnet
ThingDef.description: A deep red silicate mineral used as decration.

ThingDef.label: heliodor
ThingDef.description: A golden variety of beryl.

ThingDef.label: kunzite
ThingDef.description: A pink-to-violet variety of the mineral spodumene.

ThingDef.label: larimar
ThingDef.description: A rare blue variety of the silicate mineral pectolite.

ThingDef.label: iolite
ThingDef.description: A deep blue variety of the mineral Cordierite.

ThingDef.label: malachite
ThingDef.description: A green copper carbonate hydroxide mineral. It was one of the first ores used to produce copper metal.

ThingDef.label: marialite
ThingDef.description: A light yellow member of the scapolite group.

ThingDef.label: morganite
ThingDef.description: A pink variety of beryl.

ThingDef.label: onyx
ThingDef.description: A deep black gemstone formed of bands of chalcedony.

ThingDef.label: padparadscha
ThingDef.description: A light red variety of sapphire.

ThingDef.label: peridot
ThingDef.description: An olive-green variety of olivine.

ThingDef.label: prasiolite
ThingDef.description: A green variety of quartz.

ThingDef.label: quartz
ThingDef.description: A clear form of quartz. The second most abundant mineral in Earth's continental crust.

ThingDef.label: rose Quartz
ThingDef.description: A pink form of quartz.

ThingDef.label: ruby
ThingDef.description: A blood-red variety of corundum.

ThingDef.label: sapphire
ThingDef.description: A blue variety of corundum.

ThingDef.label: seraphinite
ThingDef.description: A dark blue-green form of clinochlore.

ThingDef.label: smokey Quartz
ThingDef.description: A brown variety of quartz.

ThingDef.label: sunstone
ThingDef.description: A bright orange variety of plagioclase feldspar.

ThingDef.label: tanzanite
ThingDef.description: A blue variety of the mineral ziosite.

ThingDef.label: diamond
ThingDef.description: A colornless solid form of carbon, known for it's beauty, hardness, and industrial uses
